scripts.start:graphics: asc assembly/graphics.ts -b build/graphics.wasm -t build/graphics.wat --sourceMap --validate --optimize && http-server -a localhost -p 1234 -o /graphics.html
scripts.start:audio: asc assembly/audio.ts -b build/audio.wasm -t build/audio.wat --sourceMap --validate --optimize && http-server -a localhost -p 1234 -o /audio.html
